summary: This document contains resolutions from a limited liability company (LLC) regarding the authorization of Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas as a depositary and investment advisor. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein, and the procedures for managing accounts associated with the LLC.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a member of the LLC and is authorized to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

keyFacts: The document certifies LLC resolutions authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage accounts for the company.
Jeffrey Epstein is named as an authorized signer for the LLC.
The document outlines the powers and responsibilities of authorized signers in relation to the company's accounts.
It states that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
The resolutions have not been modified or amended since the date shown in the document.
